<b0>Important:</b0> You need to do this in a session where no ‘<s1>.org</s1>’ file has been visited, i.e., where no Org built-in function have been loaded.
<b0>重要提示:</b0>你需要在未访问' <s1> .org </s1>'文件的会话（即未加载Org内置函数的会话）中执行此操作。
<c0>gtd.org</c0>: where I put all my projects;
<c0>someday.org</c0>: All inactive tasks that I might do at some point in the future, but don’t want to see all the time;
<c0>someday.org</c0>：所有我可能在将来某个时候完成但不想一直看到的非当前活动任务；
<c0>tickler.org</c0>: I put entries in this file with a <a1>timestamp</a1> to get reminded at the right moment.
<c0>tickler.org</c0>：我在此文件中放置了带有<a1>时间戳</a1>的条目，以便在正确的时间得到提醒。
<e0>Customizable</e0> means that you can easily alter the behavior of Emacs commands in simple ways.
<e0>可自定义</e0>意味着您可以通过简单的方式轻松地更改Emacs命令的行为。
<e0>Extensible</e0> means that you can go beyond simple customization and create entirely new commands.
<e0>可扩展</e0>意味着您可以超越简单的自定义，创建全新的命令。
<e0>Global cycling</e0>: Rotate the entire buffer among the states
<e0>全局循环</e0>：整个缓冲区在多个状态之间循环

<e0>Self-documenting</e0> means that at any time you can use special commands, known as <e1>help commands</e1>, to find out what your options are, or to find out what any command does, or to find all the commands that pertain to a given topic.
<e0>自文档</e0>意味着您可以随时使用称为<e1>帮助命令</e1>的特殊命令来找出您的选项是什么，或者找出任何命令的作用，或者查找与给定主题相关的所有命令。
<e0>Subtree cycling</e0>: Rotate current subtree among the states
<e0>子树循环</e0>:让子树在多个状态直接循环
<e0>Tags</e0> make use of the hierarchical structure of outline trees.
<e0>标签</e0>利用大纲树的层次结构。
<e0>custom views</e0> that are special searches and combinations of different views.
<e0>custom views</e0>可以自定义搜索,并结合多种不同的视图。

<e6>Control characters</e6>, such as <t7>RET</t7>, <t8>TAB</t8>, <t9>DEL</t9>, <t10>ESC</t10>, <t11>F1</t11>, <t12>Home</t12>, and <t13>LEFT</t13>, are also entered this way, as are certain characters found on non-English keyboards (see <a14>International</a14>).
<e6>控制字符(如<t7>RET</t7>、<t8>TAB</t8>、<t9>DEL</t9>、<t10>ESC</t10>、<t11>F1</t11>、<t12>Home</t12>和<t13>LEFT</t13>)也是通过这种方式输入的，非英语键盘上的某些字符也是如此(请参见<a14>国际化</a14>)
<k0><s1>SPC</s1></k0>, <k2><s3>TAB</s3></k2>, and <k4><s5>RET</s5></k4> can be used from the agenda buffer to jump to the diary file in order to edit existing diary entries.
<k0><s1>SPC</s1></k0>, <k2><s3>TAB</s3></k2>和 <k4><s5>RET</s5></k4>可以从议程缓冲区跳转到日记文件，以便编辑现有的日记条目。
<k10>c</k10> can be used to switch back and forth between calendar and agenda.
<k10>c</k10>可用于在日历和议程之间来回切换。
<k2>C-n</k2> has this effect <e3>because</e3> it is bound to <c4>next-line</c4>.
<k4>C-x</k4> combines with the next input event to make a two-event key sequence, which could itself be a prefix key (such as <k5>C-x 4</k5>), or a complete key (such as <k6>C-x C-f</k6>).
<k4>C-x</k4>与下一个输入事件组合形成两个事件的按键序列，该序列本身可以是前缀键(如<k5>C-x 4</k5>)，也可以是完整键(如<k6>C-x C-f</k6>)。
<v0>buf</v0> is the name of the buffer displayed in the window.
<v0>buf</v0>是窗口中显示的缓冲区的名称。
<v0>cs</v0> describes the character set of the text in the buffer (see <a1>Coding Systems</a1>).
<v0>cs</v0>描述缓冲区中文本的字符集(请参阅<a1>编码系统</a1>)。
<v0>fr</v0>提供选定的窗体名(请参阅<a1>窗体</a1>)。
<v0>line</v0> is the character ‘<s1>L</s1>’ followed by the line number at point.
<v0>major</v0> is the name of the <e1>major mode</e1> used in the buffer.
<v0>major</v0>是缓冲区中使用的<e1>主模式</e1>的名称。
<v0>minor</v0> is a list of some of the enabled <e1>minor modes</e1>, which are optional editing modes that provide additional features on top of the major mode.
<v0>minor</v0>是一些已启用的<e1>辅模式</e1>的列表，它们是在主模式之上提供附加功能的可选编辑模式。
<v0>pos</v0> tells you whether there is additional text above the top of the window, or below the bottom.
<v0>pos</v0>告诉您窗口顶部上方还是底部下方有其他文本。
A <e0>key sequence</e0>, or <e1>key</e1> for short, is a sequence of one or more input events that is meaningful as a unit.
<e0>键序列</e0>或简称<e1>快捷键</e1>是把有意义的一个或多个输入事件的序列作为一个单元。
A buffer that is not currently displayed remembers its value of point if you later display it again.
如果稍后再次显示当前未显示的缓冲区，则它会记住其游标。

截止日期下面会添加一条时间戳<a0><s1>71</s1></a0>，以记录您在此截止日期的上一个实例中实际操作的情况。

An Emacs window is where the <e0>buffer</e0>—the text or other graphics you are editing or viewing—is displayed.

For example, <k0>C-x</k0> is a prefix key, so typing <k1>C-x</k1> alone does not invoke a command; instead, Emacs waits for further input (if you pause for longer than a second, it echoes the <k2>C-x</k2> key to prompt for that input; see <a3>Echo Area</a3>).
例如，<k0>C-x</k0>是前缀键，因此单独键入<k1>C-x</k1>不会调用命令；相反，Emacs会等待进一步的输入(如果暂停时间超过一秒，则会回显<k2>C-x</k2>键以提示输入；请参阅<a3>回显区</a3>)。

For example, <k1>C-x =</k1> (hold down <t2>Ctrl</t2> and type <k3>x</k3>, then let go of <t4>Ctrl</t4> and type <k5>=</k5>) displays a message describing the character at point, its position in the buffer, and its current column in the window.

If you are editing several files in Emacs, each in its own buffer, each buffer has its own value of point.

Many commands in Org work on the region if the region is <e0>active</e0>.
如果某区域为<e0>活跃状态</e0>，则Org中的许多命令都可以在该区域上使用。
Many users actually run only a—very personal—fraction of Org’s capabilities, and know that there is more whenever they need it.
实际上，许多用户只运行Org的一部分功能（非常个人化），并且知道在需要时还会有更多功能。
Mapping over all or selected entries.
在所有或选定条目上映射。
在光标位置标记该子树。
Marking this DONE shifts the date by at least one day, and also
如果将此标记为DONE，则日期至少会移动一天，
Marking this DONE shifts the date by at least one week, but also
将此标记为DONE会将日期至少移动一周，
Marking this DONE shifts the date to exactly one hour from now.
如果将此标记为DONE，则日期将恰好从现在起移至一个小时后。
Marking this DONE shifts the date to one month after today.
将此标记为DONE会将日期移至今天之后的一个月。
在嵌入式上下文中匹配。
Matching specific TODO keywords can also be done as part of a tags search (see <a0>Tag Searches</a0>).
通过标签搜索也能匹配特定的TODO关键字（详见<a0>标签搜索</a0>）
Matching specific TODO keywords together with a tags match is also possible, see <a3>Tag Searches</a3>.
同时匹配TODO关键字和标签也是可行的，详见<a3>标签搜索</a3>。
HTML导出中的数学格式设置
ODT导出中的数学格式设置
Mixing it all, still finding your way.
把它们混合在一起，仍然能找到你的路。
Modifier keys can also be applied to non-alphanumerical characters, e.g., <k16>C-<s17>F1</s17></k16> or <k18>M-<s19>LEFT</s19></k18>.
修饰键还可以应用于非字母数字字符，例如，<k16>C-<s17>F1</k16>或<k18>M-</s19>LEFT</s19></k18>。
Most Emacs commands implicitly apply to the current buffer; the text displayed in unselected windows is mostly visible for reference.
大多数Emacs命令都隐式应用于当前缓冲区；显示在未选中窗口中的文本大多可见以供参考。
Most of the editing commands in Emacs are written in Lisp; the few exceptions could have been written in Lisp but use C instead for efficiency.
Emacs中的大多数编辑命令都是用Lisp编写的；少数例外可能是用Lisp编写的，但为了提高效率改用C语言实现。
Most of the variables documented in this manual are meant for customization: some command or other part of Emacs examines the variable and behaves differently according to the value that you set.
本手册中记录的大多数变量都用于自定义：Emacs的某些命令或其他部分会检查变量，并根据您设置的值采取不同的行为。
Most users will simply activate Org and begin exploring its many features.
大多数用户只需要激活Org并开始探索其众多功能。
Move subtree down, i.e., swap with next subtree of same level.
下移子树，即与同级的下一个子树互换。
Move subtree up, i.e., swap with previous subtree of same level.
上移子树，即与同级的上一个子树互换。
Moving a tree to an archive file
Moving a tree to an archive file.
移动一棵节点树到一个归档文件中。
Moving and copying information with ease.
Moving/copying a tree from one place to another.
移动/拷贝一棵节点树到另外一个地方。
Multi-character commands (see <a1>Keys</a1>) are echoed if you pause for more than a second in the middle of a command.
如果您在输入命令时暂停超过一秒，则会回显多字符命令(请参阅<a1>快捷键</a1>)。
Multiple keyword sets in one file
一个文件中的多个关键字集

My contexts tend to change over time, but I always have at least <c0>@home</c0>, <c1>@office</c1>, <c2>@travelling</c2>, <c3>@phone</c3>, <c4>@email</c4>, <c5>@errands</c5> to filter out next actions based on my current location for instance.
我的上下文往往会随着时间的推移而变化，但我始终至少使用<c0>@home</c0>, <c1>@office</c1>, <c2>@travelling</c2>, <c3>@phone</c3>, <c4>@email</c4>, <c5>@errands</c5>，以根据我当前的位置筛选出下一步行动。
My inbox is then processed and emptied daily.
然后，我的收件箱每天都会被处理和清空。
Named functions run by key sequences to do editing.
命名函数由键序列运行以进行编辑。
将缓冲区聚焦到当前块。
将缓冲区聚焦到当前子树
New commands are simply programs written in the Lisp language, which are run by Emacs’s own Lisp interpreter.
新命令只是用Lisp语言编写的程序，由Emacs自己的Lisp解释器运行。
New export backends can be derived from existing ones, or defined from scratch.
新的导出后端可以从现有的后端衍生出来，也可以从头开始定义。
下一个/上一个同级标题。
下一个/上一个可见标题。

下一页: <a0>iCalendar Export</a0>, 上一页: <a1>Org Export</a1>, 返回: <a2>Exporting</a2> [<a3>目录</a3>][<a4>索引</a4>]
Normally the global TODO list simply shows all headlines with TODO keywords.
一般来说，全局TODO列表只是简单的展示所有带有TODO关键字的大纲标题。
Normally, Emacs automatically handles these settings for you, but it is sometimes useful to have this information.
通常，Emacs会自动为您处理这些设置，但有时拥有此信息很有用。
并不是所有的任务都是相等的。
Note that Orgmode is quite smart about how you can enter a date, if you don’t know about it, refer to the <a2>manual entry</a2>.
请注意，Orgmode在如何输入日期方面非常聪明，如果你不会使用，请参阅<a2>使用手册</a2>。
Note that in this case, ‘<s0>make autoloads</s0>’ is mandatory: it defines Org’s version in ‘<s1>org-version.el</s1>’ and Org’s autoloads in ‘<s2>org-loaddefs.el</s2>’.
请注意，在这种情况下，必须使用'<s0>make autoloads</s0>'：它在'<s1>org-version.el</s1>'中定义Org的版本，并在'<s2>org-loaddefs .el</s2>'中定义Org的自动加载。
Note that inside tables (see <a0>Tables</a0>), <k1>S-<s2>TAB</s2></k1> jumps to the previous field instead.
请注意，在表格中(请参阅<a0>表格</a0>)，<k1>S-<s2>TAB</s2></k1>会跳转到上一个字段。
Note that the expression entries must start at the left margin, no whitespace is allowed before them, as seen in the following segment of an Org file:<a0><s1>96</s1></a0>
请注意，表达式条目必须从左边距开始，前面不允许有空格，如Org文件的以下片段所示：<a0><s1>96</s1></a0>
Note that when point is inside a table (see <a0>Tables</a0>), the Meta-Cursor keys have different functionality.
请注意，当光标位于表格中时(请参见<a0>表格</a0>)，Meta修饰标键具有不同的功能。
Often a small example file helps, along with clear information about:
通常，一个小的示例文件会有所帮助，同时提供以下方面的清晰信息：
Often the description of a command will say, “To change this, set the variable <c1>mumble-foo</c1>.” A variable is a name used to store a value.
通常，命令的描述会说，“要更改这一点，请设置变量<c1>mumble-foo</c1>。”变量是用于存储值的名称。
On a display that supports a mouse, you can use the mouse to choose a command from the menu bar.
在支持鼠标的显示器上，您可以使用鼠标从菜单栏中选择命令。
On a graphical display, directly below the menu bar is a <e1>tool bar</e1>, a row of icons that perform editing commands when you click on them.
在图形显示器上，菜单栏正下方是<e1>工具栏</e1>，这是一行图标，当您单击它们时，它们会执行编辑命令。
On a graphical display, such as on GNU/Linux using the X Window System, Emacs occupies a graphical window.
在图形显示器上，例如在使用X窗口系统的GNU/Linux上，Emacs占据一个图形窗口。
On a graphical display, the mode line is drawn with a 3D box appearance.
在图形显示上，状态栏以3D长方体外观绘制。
On a graphical display, the selected window shows a more prominent cursor (usually solid and blinking); other windows show a less prominent cursor (usually a hollow box).
在图形显示器上，所选窗口显示较突出的光标(通常为实心且闪烁)；其他窗口显示较不突出的光标(通常为空心框)。
On a graphical display, the window possesses a <e1>scroll bar</e1> on one side, which can be used to scroll through the buffer.
在图形显示器上，窗口的一侧有一个<e1>滚动条</e1>，可用于在缓冲区中滚动。
On a text terminal, <v0>cs</v0> is preceded by two additional characters that describe the coding systems for keyboard input and terminal output.
在文本终端上，<v0>cs</v0>前面有两个额外的字符，用于描述键盘输入和终端输出的编码系统。
On a text terminal, Emacs occupies the entire terminal screen.
在文本终端上，Emacs占据整个终端屏幕。
On a text terminal, there is only one cursor, which is shown in the selected window.
在文本终端上，只有一个光标显示在所选窗口中。
On a text terminal, this text is followed by a series of dashes extending to the right edge of the window.
在文本终端上，此文本后面跟着一系列延伸到窗口右边缘的破折号。
On a text terminal, you can optionally access the menu-bar menus in the echo area.
在文本终端上，您可以选择访问回显区的菜单栏菜单。
On frames created for <c0>emacsclient</c0> (see <a1>Invoking emacsclient</a1>), the next character is ‘<s2>@</s2>’.
在为<c0>emacsclient</c0>创建的窗体上(请参阅<a1>调用emacsclient</a1>)，下一个字符是“<s2>@</s2>”。
On graphical displays, the window manager might block some keyboard inputs, including <k0>M-<s1>TAB</s1></k0>, <k2>M-<s3>SPC</s3></k2>, <k4>C-M-d</k4> and <k5>C-M-l</k5>.
在图形显示上，窗口管理器可能会拦截一些键盘输入，包括<k0>M-<s1>TAB</k0>、<k2>M-<s3>SPC</s3></k2>、<k4>C-M-d</k4>和<k5>C-M-l</k5>。
On some systems, Emacs displays ‘<s6>(Unix)</s6>’ instead of the colon for files that use newline as the line separator.
在某些系统上，对于使用换行符作为行分隔符的文件，Emacs显示“<s6>(Unix)</s6>”，而不是冒号。
Once a task is done, I mark it as such using the <c0>DONE</c0> todo keyword.
一旦任务完成，我就使用<c0>DONE</c0>关键字对其进行标记。
Once echoing has started, the rest of the command echoes immediately as you type it.
回显开始后，命令的剩余部分会在您键入它时立即回显。
Once information is in the system, it may need to be moved around.
当信息进入系统后，可能需要四处移动。
Once you’re done capturing, <c1>C-c C-c</c1> and it will get stored in the inbox.
一旦您完成捕获，使用<c1>C-c C-c</c1>将它存储在收件箱中。
One of the most important aspects of GTD is the inbox.
GTD最重要的一个方面是收件箱。
One way to get a copy of GNU Emacs is from someone else who has it.
获得GNU Emacs副本的一种方式是从其他拥有它的人那里。
Only show a template in a specific context.
仅在特定上下文中显示模板。
Optionally, you can compile the files and/or install them in your system.
（可选）您可以编译文件和/或将它们安装在系统中。
Options for exporting tables to LaTeX.
Org can be used to implement many different project planning schemes, such as David Allen’s GTD system.
Org可以用来实践多种不同的项目规划方案，例如David Allen的GTD系统。
Org can select items based on various criteria and display them in a separate buffer.
Org 可以根据各种条件来选择符合条件的事项，并在一个新的缓冲区中显示它们。
Org develops organizational tasks around notes files that contain lists or information about projects as plain text.
Org围绕笔记文件开发组织任务，这些笔记文件以纯文本形式包含有关项目的列表或信息。
Org files can include source code blocks, which makes Org uniquely suited for authoring technical documents with code examples.
Org文件可以包含源代码块，这使Org特别适合编写带有代码示例的技术文档。
Org files can serve as a single source authoring system with export to many different formats such as HTML, LaTeX, Open Document, and Markdown.
Org文件可以用作单一源创作系统，并可以导出多种不同的格式，例如HTML、LaTeX，Open Document和Markdown。
Org greatly simplifies the use of outlines by compressing the entire show and hide functionalities into a single command, <c0>org-cycle</c0>, which is bound to the <k1><s2>TAB</s2></k1> key.
Org通过将显示和隐藏的功能压缩到<c0>org-cycle</c0>这个单一的命令上来简化大纲的使用，它的按键绑定为<k1><s2>TAB</s2></k1>。
Org headlines start on the left margin<a0><s1>3</s1></a0> with one or more stars followed by a space.
Org标题从左边距<a0><s1>3</s1></a0>开始，后面跟着一个或者多个星号和空格。
Org is a mode for keeping notes, maintaining TODO lists, and project planning with a fast and effective plain-text markup language.
Org是Emacs的一个模式，它使用一种快速高效的纯文本标记语言，用来进行笔记管理、维护TODO列表以及项目规划。
Org is implemented on top of Outline mode, which makes it possible to keep the content of large files well structured.
Org基于大纲模式实现，这样就可以保持大型文件的内容结构良好。
Org is included in all recent distributions of GNU Emacs, so you probably do not need to install it.
Org包含在GNU Emacs的所有最新发行版中，因此您可能不需要安装它。
Org使简单的事情变得更简单。
Org mode buffers need Font Lock to be turned on: this is the default in Emacs<a0><s1>1</s1></a0>.
Org模式缓冲区需要打开字体锁定，这是Emacs中的默认设置s<a0><s1>1</s1></a0>。

Org mode deals with this in the following way: when you try to mark such an entry as done, using <k4>C-c C-t</k4>, it shifts the base date of the repeating timestamp by the repeater interval, and immediately sets the entry state back to TODO<a5><s6>70</s6></a5>.
Org mode通过以下方式处理此问题：当您尝试使用<k4>C-c C-t</k4>将这样的条目标记为完成时，它将重复时间戳的基准日期移位一个复读机间隔，并立即将条目状态设置回TODO<a5><s6>70</s6></a5>。
Org mode either offers completion or a special single-key interface for setting tags, see below.
组织模式提供完成或特殊的单键界面来设置标签，如下所示。
Org mode evaluates diary-style expression entries, and does it faster because there is no overhead for first creating the diary display.
Org mode计算日记样式的表达式条目，并且计算速度更快，因为第一次创建日记显示没有开销。
Org mode has extensive support for tags.
Org mode对标签有广泛的支持。
Org mode helps to organize such tasks using a so-called repeater in a ‘<s0>DEADLINE</s0>’, ‘<s1>SCHEDULED</s1>’, or plain timestamps<a2><s3>69</s3></a2>.
Org mode为了组织这样的任务，使通过在 ‘<s0>DEADLINE</s0>’, ‘<s1>SCHEDULED</s1>’,或普通时间戳<a2><s3>69</s3></a2> 上使用被称为复读机的功能。
Org mode often uses the same key for different functions, depending on context.
Org模式通常根据上下文将相同的键用于不同的功能。
Org provides Refile, Copy and Archive commands for this.
Org为此提供了转接，拷贝和归档命令。
Org source code blocks are fully functional; they can be evaluated in place and their results can be captured in the file.
Org源代码块功能齐全，可以对其进行求值，并将结果捕获到文件中。
Org supports tag insertion based on a <e0>list of tags</e0>.
Org支持基于<e0>标签列表</e0>的标签插入。
Org supports this and can show BBDB anniversaries as part of the agenda.
Org支持这一点，并可以将BBDB周年纪念作为议程的一部分。
Org uses just two commands, bound to <k0><s1>TAB</s1></k0> and <k2>S-<s3>TAB</s3></k2> to change the visibility in the buffer.
Org只使用两个命令来更改缓冲区中的可见性，分别是按键绑定<k0><s1>TAB</s1></k0>和<k2>S-<s3>TAB</s3></k2>。
Org uses various syntactical elements: TODO keywords, tags, property names, keywords, blocks, etc.
Org使用各种语法元素：TODO关键字，标签，属性名称，关键字，块等。
Org-mode’s built-in agenda commands are powerful tools for searching your notes and for gathering, sorting, filtering, and displaying your tasks.
Org-mode的内置议程命令是搜索笔记以及收集、排序、过滤和显示任务的强大工具。
Orgmode has a great feature that fits really well with this concept: <a0>org-capture</a0>.
Org模式有一个非常好的特性，非常适合这个概念：<a0>org-capture</a0>。
Orgmode is such a moldable tool that I don’t think that there are 2 exactly identical setups.
Orgmode是一个具有可塑性的的工具，我不认为有两个完全相同的设置。
Orgtbl for LaTeX and other programs.
Other characters represent various <e4>coding systems</e4>—for example, ‘<s5>1</s5>’ represents ISO Latin-1.
其他字符表示各种<e4>编码系统</e4>-例如，‘<s5>1</s5>’表示ISO Latin-1。
Other commands take two or more input events to invoke, such as <k1>C-x C-f</k1> and <k2>C-x 4 C-f</k2>.
其他命令需要调用两个或多个输入事件，例如<k1>C-x C-f</k1>和<k2>C-x 4 C-f</k2>。
Otherwise autoload Org functions will mess up the installation.
否则，自动加载的Org函数会破坏安装操作。

否则，对当前标题的子项进行排序。

否则，如果查看的是缓冲区的开头，则为“<s3>Top</s3>”，如果查看的是缓冲区的末尾，则为“<s4>Bot</s4>”，或者为“<s5><v6>nn</v6>%</s5>”，其中<v7>nn</v7>是窗口顶部以上的缓冲区的百分比。
Otherwise, restrict it to the current subtree<a0><s1>94</s1></a0>.
否则,限制agenda视图的范围为当前的subtree
Outlines allow a document to be organized in a hierarchical structure, which, least for me, is the best representation of notes and thoughts.
大纲可以使使文档按层次进行组织结构，至少对我而言，这是笔记和思想的最佳表示形式。
Outlines make it possible to hide parts of the text in the buffer.
大纲可以让隐藏缓冲区中的部分文本成为可能。

Some Emacs commands are invoked by just one input event; for example, <k0>C-f</k0> moves forward one character in the buffer.
一些Emacs命令仅由一个输入事件调用；例如，<k0>C-f</k0>在缓冲区中向前移动一个字符。
Some commands display informative messages in the echo area to tell you what the command has done, or to provide you with some specific information.
某些命令在回显区域显示信息性消息，以告诉您该命令执行了什么操作，或者为您提供一些特定信息。
Some features are listed together with the minor modes whenever they are turned on, even though they are not really minor modes.

某些主模式在主模式名称后显示附加信息。

有些任务需要一遍又一遍地重复。
Some things are more important than others.
有些事情比其他事情更重要。

TODO items may have sublevels to break up the task into subtasks.
TODO事项可能含有多个层级，用于将一个任务分解为多个子任务。
TODO keywords are written with all capitals, even if they are user-defined.

Tag inheritance is relevant when the agenda search tries to match a tag, either in the <c0>tags</c0> or <c1>tags-todo</c1> agenda types.
当议程搜索尝试匹配<c0>标签</c0>或<c1>标签-待办事项</c1>议程类型中的标签时，标签继承是相关的。
Tagging headlines and matching sets of tags.
给标题打标签和按标签聚类

标签是在标题上使用<c0>C-c C-c</c0>完成的，无论它是项目还是行动。
Tags are automatically realigned after promotion, demotion, and TODO state changes (see <a4>TODO Basics</a4>).
标签在升级、降级和待办事项状态更改后自动重新对齐(请参阅<a4>TODO基础知识</a4>)。
Tags are normal words containing letters, numbers, ‘<s0>_</s0>’, and ‘<s1>@</s1>’.
标签是包含字母、数字、“<s0>_</s0>”和“<s1>@</s1>”的普通单词。
Tags by default are in bold face with the same color as the headline.
默认情况下，标签以粗体显示，颜色与标题相同。
Tags can simply be typed into the buffer at the end of a headline.
只需在缓冲区中的标题末尾键入标签即可。
Tags must be preceded and followed by a single colon, e.g., ‘<s2>:work:</s2>’.
标签必须前后各有一个冒号，例如，“<s2>:work:</s2>”。
Tags that link to people, like <c0>:daniel:</c0>;
Tags use the tree structure of an outline.

The <k6>i</k6> command to insert new entries for the current date works in the agenda buffer, as well as the commands <k7>S</k7>, <k8>M</k8>, and <k9>C</k9> to display Sunrise/Sunset times, show lunar phases and to convert to other calendars, respectively.

<s3>*Messages*</s3>缓冲区限制为一定的行数，由变量<c4>message-log-max</c4>指定。

Two commonly-used modifier keys are <t1>Control</t1> (usually labeled <t2>Ctrl</t2>), and <t3>Meta</t3> (usually labeled <t4>Alt</t4>)<a5><s6>3</s6></a5>.

Typesetting Conventions Used in this Manual
Typesetting conventions used in this manual.
Typing the help character (<k0>C-h</k0> or <t1>F1</t1>) after a prefix key displays a list of the commands starting with that prefix.
在前缀键后键入帮助字符(<k0>C-h</k0>或<t1>F1</t1>)将显示以该前缀开头的命令列表。
指向互联网的类似URL的链接。
Unlike <t10>Meta</t10>, <t11>ESC</t11> is entered as a separate character.
与<t10>Meta</t10>不同，<t11>ESC</t11>作为单独的字符输入。
Until then, you can just focus on something else and free your mind from this task.
在那之前，你可以把注意力放在别的事情上，把你的思想从这项任务中解放出来。
Use and contribute to a library of useful code blocks.

Use this to (as an exception) assign several tags from such a group.
使用此选项(作为例外)从这样的组中分配多个标记。
User-defined properties are capitalized; built-in properties with special meaning are written with all capitals.
用户定义的属性以首字母大写形式； 具有特殊含义的内置属性使用全大写字母书写。
User-defined tags are written in lowercase; built-in tags with special meaning are written as they should appear in the document, usually with all capitals.
用户定义的标签以小写形式编写； 具有特殊含义的内置标签应按应在文档中出现的方式书写，通常使用全大写。

我们称Emacs<e0>高级</e0>是因为它不只是简单地插入和删除文本。

When <k0>S-<s1>TAB</s1></k0> is called with a numeric prefix argument <v2>N</v2>, view contents only up to headlines of level <v3>N</v3>.

When Emacs first visits an Org file, the global state is set to <c0>showeverything</c0>, i.e., all file content is visible<a1><s2>6</s2></a1>.
当Emacs首次访问Org文件时，全局状态设置为<c0>showeverything</c0>，即所有文件内容均可见<a1><s2>6</s2></a1>。
When Emacs starts up, the initial frame displays a special buffer named ‘<s0>*GNU Emacs*</s0>’.
当Emacs启动时，初始窗体中显示一个名为‘<s0>*GNU Emacs*</s0>’的特殊缓冲区。
When a headline matches during a tags search while tag inheritance is turned on, all the sublevels in the same tree—for a simple match form—match as well<a0><s1>52</s1></a0>.
如果在打开标记继承的情况下在标签搜索期间匹配标题，则同一树中的所有子级别(对于简单匹配表单)也会匹配<a0><s1>52</s1></a0>。
When called with a <k3>C-u</k3> prefix, all tags in the current buffer are aligned to that column, just to make things look nice.

When called with a universal prefix argument or with point before the first headline in a file, set the agenda scope to the entire file.
使用该命令时，如果附带了前缀参数，或是光标置于第一个标题之前，genda的范围被限制为整个这个文件。
When deciding what to work on, I use either <a0>sparse trees</a0> – which makes it easy to filter the content of my GTD projects by tag, search term, etc., or I use <a1>custom agenda commands</a1>.
当决定要处理什么时，我会使用<a0>稀疏树</a0>——这使得通过标签、搜索词等过滤我的GTD项目内容变得很容易，或者我使用<a1>自定义议程命令</a1>。
状态是什么时候更改的？

您可以通过在Emacs init文件中配置变量<c1>org-tag-ist</c1>来全局执行此操作。
You can download Org latest release from <a0>Org’s website</a0>.

您可以通过键入<k8><s9>ESC</s9>C-a</k8>来输入<k4>C-M-a</k4>(同时按住<t5>Ctrl</t5>和<t6>Alt</t6>，然后按<k7>a</k7>)。
You can ignore the information about variables until you are interested in customizing them.
您可以忽略有关变量的信息，直到您对自定义它们感兴趣为止。
You can install Org from the “package menu”, with <k0>M-x list-packages</k0>.
输入命令 <k0>M-x list-packages</k0>，你便可以从“软件包清单”中安装Org。
You can override this by setting <c2>org-agenda-skip-comment-trees</c2> and <c3>org-agenda-skip-archived-trees</c3> to <c4>nil</c4>.

You can run global cycling using <k0><s1>TAB</s1></k0> only if point is at the very beginning of the buffer, but not on a headline, and <c2>org-cycle-global-at-bob</c2> is set to a non-<c3>nil</c3> value.
您可以使用<k0><s1>TAB</s1></k0>运行全局循环，前提是光标位于缓冲区的最开始处，而不是在标题上，并且<c2>org-cycle-global-at-bob</c2>设置为非<c3>nil</c3>值。

You can set the variable <c4>inhibit-startup-screen</c4> using the Customize facility (see <a5>Easy Customization</a5>), or by editing your initialization file (see <a6>Init File</a6>).<a7><s8>4</s8></a7>
您可以使用自定义功能(请参见<a5>轻松自定义</a5>)或通过编辑初始化文件(请参见<a6>初始化文件</a6>)来设置变量<c4>inhibit-startup-screen</c4>。<a7><s8>4</s8></a7>

你可以从<a1>这个页面</a1>订阅此列表。

然后，您可以继续为BBDB记录定义周年纪念。

然后，您可以使用箭头键或<k2>C-b</k2>、<k3>C-f</k3>(左/右)、<k4>C-p</k4>和<k5>C-n</k5>(上/下)来导航菜单。

通过<c3>org-toggle-stick-agenda</c3>命令，您可以随时切换粘滞议程视图。
You can type the item’s letter or digit to select the item.
您可以键入项目的字母或数字来选择项目。

您可以使用向上和向下箭头键在菜单中移动到不同的项目，然后可以键入<t7>RET</t7>选择项目。

您可以通过使用“<s2>y</s2>”、“<s3>w</s3>”、“<s4>m</s4>”、“<s5>d</s5>”和“<s6>h</s6>”字母来创建每年、每月、每周、每天和每小时间隔的复读机。

您可以访问我们的在线商店<a1>https://shop.fsf.org/</a1>.

您不能将输入事件追加到完全键上。

the final heading has the tags ‘<s0>work</s0>’, ‘<s1>boss</s1>’, ‘<s2>notes</s2>’, and ‘<s3>action</s3>’ even though the final heading is not explicitly marked with those tags.
最后一个标题将具有标签“<s0>work</s0>”、“<s1>boss</s1>”、“<s2>notes</s2>”和“<s3>action</s3>”，即使最后一个标题没有用这些标签显式标签。
the ‘<s0>+1m</s0>’ is a repeater; the intended interpretation is that the task has a deadline on ‘<s1><2005-10-01></s1>’ and repeats itself every (one) month starting from that time.
“<s0>+1m</s0>”是一个复读机；预期的解释是任务的截止日期为“<s1><2005-10-01></s1>”，并从该时间开始每(一个)月重复一次。

介绍
‘<s0>Narrow</s0>’ means that the buffer being displayed has editing restricted to only a portion of its text (see <a1>Narrowing</a1>).
‘<s0>Narrow</s0>’表示正在显示的缓冲区的编辑仅限于其文本的一部分(请参阅<a1>聚焦</a1>)。
‘<s2>Def</s2>’ means that a keyboard macro is currently being defined (see <a3>Keyboard Macros</a3>).
“<s2>Def</s2>”表示当前正在定义键盘宏(请参阅<a3>键盘宏</a3>)。
‘<s3>=</s3>’ means no conversion whatsoever, and is usually used for files containing non-textual data.
“<s3>=</s3>”表示不进行任何转换，通常用于包含非文本数据的文件。
